description: This notification is the MSTP equivalent of the standard STP newRoot notification.

event.Summary: Bridge has become the new spanning tree root for MST instance $v1

description: An integer that uniquely identifies an MST instance
from 0 to the object value of mSTMaxInstanceNumber.
variables.name: PRVT-MST-MIB::mSTInstanceIndex

description: This notification is the MSTP equivalent of the standard STP topologyChange notification.

event.Summary: Bridge on MST $v1 has transitioned to a new topology state

description: An integer that uniquely identifies an MST instance
from 0 to the object value of mSTMaxInstanceNumber.
variables.name: PRVT-MST-MIB::mSTInstanceIndex
